text:
Roseanne Park is a New Zealand-born Australian singer. She is based in South Korea and goes by the mononym Rosé. She is known for being a member of Blackpink, which as of 2019 is the highest-charting female K-pop group. She has also performed as a solo artist, with her song making it to number 10 on the Gaon Music Chart. Rosé is well known on social media in South Korea, with 20 million followers. It is expected that this year (2020) she will have her solo debut, which was announced back in 2018.
Rosé was born in New Zealand on 11 February 1997. At the age of seven, she moved to Australia. In 2012, she had an audition for YG Entertainment at the age of 15. She later signed with YG Entertainment and moved to South Korea. In 2018 it was announced that BLACKPINK has been signed to INTERSCOPE Records.
